description.narrative: The Young Green Environmental Network – Northern will develop internet cafe to fund education programs and serve as a location for information acquisition and sharing between youth and adult members and stakeholders. The Northern Province's environment and natural resources are being pressured by unsustainable and rapid development practices and a growing population. The main issues affecting the region include unsustainable agricultural practices, overfishing, and poaching and encroachment in Nsumbu National Park. The group has witnessed a lack in information sharing between members and stakeholders, and will use the cafe to support information exchanges. With the funds generated by the cafe, the network will pay for management activities, research, and educational activities for stakeholders on the importance of preserving natural resources.
